Time till stopping oral contraceptives is a **input factor**. It means that it is one of the inputs from the user to the model.

#### Alternative names:
* OCP stop
* Time till OCP stop
* Time till stopping oral contraceptives
* OralContraceptiveTillStop

#### Uses

Time till stopping oral contraceptives is used by the model in the following places

* [Ever used oral contraceptives](/model/OralContraceptiveEver)
* [Time since taking OCP per year](/model/OralContraceptiveSinceStop)

#### Guidance

The user input is a typed number and should answer the question

> For how long will you continue to take oral contraceptives?

The unit of the input is **Years**.

The answer has to be larger than 0 Years. The answer is recommended to be larger than 0 Years and smaller than 110 Years. Oral contraceptives are also called birth control pills and are used to preven pregnancies.


### Optimizability

[Optimizability](/model/optimizabilities) is a subjective measure used to describe how easy it is to optimize a certain factor of your life. The optimizability of Time till stopping oral contraceptives is 5. This means that it can be interpreted as

> *It is possible to change, and it can be changed now or very soon.*
